About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Tues and Thurs 10-6, Wed and Fri 10-5, Sat 9-1, Sun 1-5.; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3 and newspapers.

About.Acquisition focus: Focus is on materials published or produced in the Alice Springs area. This area ranges from Pt Augusta to Tennant Creek and to the N.T. borders east and west of Alice Springs.

About.Major holdings: Robert Laver: Photographs 1921-1925 (1m). Old Timer's Museum: Photographs 1900 - 1970s (1m).

Contact.Street address: Corner Leichhardt and Gregory Terrace, Alice Springs 0870
